body:
If interested, some code that uses TensorBoard embeddings to display character and word embeddings:
https://github.com/Franck-Dernoncourt/NeuroNER

Example:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/15331/23913783/609a87ea-08ba-11e7-91cf-0c0ba9765b53.png)

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/15331/23913794/6bad7ed0-08ba-11e7-9ef2-aadc0a747bea.png)

FYI: [How can I select which checkpoint to view in TensorBoard's embeddings tab?](http://stackoverflow.com/q/42679552/395857)
